inn1.comm: he begins with a fullish delivery on off stump, Bell leans forward and closes the face to play the ball on the leg side
on a good length outside off with a hint of movement away from the right-hander, Bell moves forward and lets the ball pass

the length is too full on off stump, Bell comes on to the front foot and clips the ball neatly wide of the fielder at mid-on, Nel gives chase and picks the ball up inside the boundary, that was a long chase

edged but safe! Prior gets squared up by a good length ball that seams away from him, the ball flies right between first and second slip, Smith and Kallis barely moved, they just looked at each other, it was closer to Kallis at second slip I reckon
short of a length on off stump, defended on the back foot
Prior gets behind the line of a good length ball just outside off and defends towards point
full ball outside off stump, Bell chases it and tries to drive through cover, the ball was too far from him and it straightened off the pitch to beat the bat
this time the line is closer to off stump and Bell lets it go through to Boucher
full delivery angling into the right-hander, Bell waits for it and opens the face to guide the ball behind point towards third man
good length and the line is angling into Prior's off and middle stump, he gets on to the front foot and plays the ball back to Ntini
Prior tries to force the ball on the leg side but doesn't quite time it
super shot! Prior plants his front foot forward and drives a full ball on the up through the gap at cover, there's no chasing that one, excellent timing
Steyn bowls a full ball wide outside off stump and it swings further away from the right0hander, "Wide," says umpire Gould
this time the line is closer to off stump and Bell lets it go through to Boucher
good length just outside the off stump, Steyn's getting the ball to seam away from the right-hander, Bell comes on to the front foot and plays no shot
once again the swing away from the right-hander takes the ball far away from Bell, umpire Gould calls the second wide of the over
closer to off stump this time, Bell gets on to the front foot and defends solidly, he accounted for the movement away from him

Bell strides forward and punches a fuller delivery towards mid-off, Gibbs runs towards the ball from cover and dives, he gets a hand on it but pushes it away from Philander at mid-off so the batsmen run a single
the outside edge runs down towards third man
short of a length outside off stump, Prior stays in his crease and shoulders arms
Ntini goes wide of the crease and angles the ball into the right-hander, Bell moves forward and defends towards point
good length on off and middle stump, Bell gets behind the line and defends

Bell tries to defend on the front foot but the angle into him is sharp and the ball hits the inside edge and thuds into the pad, Ntini turned around to appeal but stopped after realizing Bell had  hit it
Bell moves forward and pulls a short of a length delivery through midwicket, he didn't time it well but a fumble allowed the second
the line is a bit too straight and Bell flicks off his pads through square leg
short of a length on middle stump, Prior moves back in his crease and tucks the ball towards the leg side
Bell moves forward, watches the ball as it pitches on a good length and seams away from him, and lets it go
this time he came forward and played slightly away from his body at a delivery that moved away from him, he connected with the middle of his bat and played the ball to mid-off
Bell stays in his crease and opens the face to guide the ball wide of the fielder at slip, he played that with soft hands
that's simply too full and too much on leg stump, Prior flicks the ball off the front foot firmly through square leg for his third boundary
the short ball at 88mph, Prior tries to pull but the ball is too quick and he gets an edge that lobs tamely on the off side, Steyn has a word
good length and just outside off stump, Prior plays and gets beaten
too full and the ball slides down leg side as well, Bell tries to flick but misses, poor line to bowl with fine leg in the circle
short of a length wide outside off stump, Bell decides to let it pass
good length from Ntini angling into the right-hander's off stump, Bell defends off the front foot
short of a length on middle stump, Bell takes half a stride forward and defends towards midwicket
Ntini delivers from wide of the crease and angles the ball towards off stump, Bell covers the line and defends on the off side
Bell defends slightly inside the line this time and gets an outside edge that runs towards third man
Prior was right behind the line of Ntini's short of a length delivery as he defended off the back foot
played off the pads behind square for a single
short of a length from Steyn who is bowling a wicket-to-wicket line, Prior defends off the back foot
Steyn bowls a slower and fuller ball on middle and off, Prior moves forward and defends towards cover
85 mph from Steyn on middle stump, Prior defends with a straight bat towards the leg side

that's flamboyant! Steyn swings the ball away from the right-hander but he's given Prior too much width, Prior sees the ball move early and lofts the ball through cover point for four, he drove that extremely hard
short of a length on off and middle, Prior moves back and across and defends on the leg side
Ntini angles the ball into the right-hander from outside off stump, Bell defends inside the line of the ball and gets beaten
fuller length outside off stump, Bell moves forward and drives towards mid-off
good length and line from Ntini just outside off, Bell once again defends but plays inside the line of the ball and gets beaten
Bell moves forward and plays the ball which comes into him towards de Villiers at point, he gets some bad bounce and Bell gets a single
Ntini goes extremely wide of the crease and slants the ball into Prior who closes the face of the bat and plays the ball to midwicket
played with soft hands towards cover point and the batsmen sprint the single, de Villiers ran in and threw the ball at the stumps, Prior would have been out had he hit
defended on the back foot
good length delivery on off stump, Bell gets behind the line and blocks

too full on leg stump, Bell moves across his stumps and tries to flick, he misses and gets hit on the pad, Boucher does well to dive to his left and take the pace off the ball, Smith runs from slip towards fine leg to field
the slower ball but the batsman picks it up early and drives the ball straight past the bowler, the outfield is on the slower side
another short ball hurries Bell who mis-times his pull, the ball falls just short of Duminy at square leg
too full on the pads, Bell leans across and flicks towards long leg
good length from Ntini angling into off and middle stump, Bell moves forward and defends towards the leg side
defended on the front foot towards mid-on
that's too short and Bell swivels off the front foot and pulls the ball along the ground through midwicket, there's a fielder in the deep
driven off the front foot towards mid-off
short of a length on off stump, defended off the back foot towards point
good length delivery on off stump, defended towards the off side
he begins with a half-volley on the pads and Prior flicks it crisply towards deep square leg
Bell defends off the front foot towards midwicket
fuller length on middle stump, Bell strides forward and puses the ball towards mid-on
the slower ball bowled full on the pads, the batsman tries to flick but doesn't make proper contact

dropped, and it's an absolute sitter, one of the easiest catches you can hope to get, Prior was beaten by a slower ball on a good length just outside off stump, he tried to drive and took one hand off the bat as he chipped the ball tamely towards mid-off, Philander was the fielder and the ball came to him at head height at a gentle pace, it hit his hands and fell right out
defended on the leg side
steered towards third man for a single
played off the pads on the leg side for one more
short of a length outside off stump, Bell lets it go
defended on the back foot on the leg side
good length delivery on off stump, defended towards cover on the front foot
bowled full on off and middle stump, Bell leans forward and blocks
good length outside the off stump, guided towards gully off the back foot
short of a length on middle stump, Prior moves back and across and defends on the leg side
Bell moves back and across and flicks a good length ball off his pads towards long leg, the line was a bit too straight, that brings up the 50 partnership
this time Nel is on off stump and the batsman defends off the back foot towards the bowler
defended on the front foot towards the off side
Prior moves outside the line of off stump and closes the face to play the ball through midwicket
Ntini beats Bell with a slower ball and he scoops it uppishly but into the gap at cover
Prior backs away to create room and slashes hard, he connects but can't beat the fielder at cover point
good length and line on off and middle, Prior defends on the front foot towards the bowler
Nel bowls too straight and Prior flicks the ball off his pads towards deep midwicket
Ntini strays down leg side and concedes a wide
short of a length on off stump, the batsman gets behind the line and blocks

there's a loud appeal from Nel for lbw, he bowled a good length ball angling into off stump, Bell came down the pitch and took a step outside off stump to create the angle to flick off his pads, he missed and got hit on the pads, it was perhaps too high for he was a long way down, might have struck him outside off as well
played towards the leg side for a single
cut off the back foot behind point for a single
tight line and length on middle stump, Prior moves forward and closes the face to play the ball on the leg side
Nel tests Prior with a short ball which hurries on to the batsman, Prior tries to hook because fine leg is up in the circle but he doesn't connect
Prior moves forward and defends a good length delivery on the leg side
Ntini goes wide of the crease and angles a good length ball into off stump, Bell moves outside the line of off stump and defends on the leg side
Bell drops the ball with soft hands on the off side, he looks for the single but doesn't get one
Bell moves on to the back foot and flicks a short of a length ball off his hips through midwicket
pushed with soft hands towards the off side for a single
good length from Ntini and the off and middle stump line doesn't give Prior any room, he defends on the front foot towards the bowler
Prior takes a step down the pitch, Ntini sees him coming and cramps the batsman for room by angling a shorter ball into Prior's body, he gets hit on the thigh
good length on middle stump, Bell plays the ball on the leg side
Bell takes a step down the track and punches a short of a length delivery towards Duminy at cover point, nice timing but no placement
this time he's placed it nicely wide of the fielder at mid-on, Bell went back and clipped a good length ball into the gap, Prior calls him back for the second
driven firmly off the front foot but straight to Gibbs at cover
Bell once again steps out of his crease and cuts a short of a length ball towards the fielder on the sweeper boundary
Prior moves forward and defends a good length ball on the leg side
good length outside off at 81mph, Bell moves forward and nudges the ball towards mid-on and calls for the quick single
full ball on the pads, Prior flicks the ball firmly towards deep midwicket
Kallis gives Bell a half-volley outside off stump, Bell strides forward and plays a powerful drive, the placement isn't as good and Gibbs stops it at cover
Bell plays the ball off his hips behind square for two
short of a length on middle stump, Bell nudges the ball off the back foot towards midwicket
fuller ball angling into the right-hander, Prior moves back and across and pushes the ball between the fielders at midwicket and mid-on
good length ball on off stump, Prior gets behind the line and defends towards the bowler
Nel bangs in the bouncer, Prior sways out of the way

he's launched that! Prior steps out of his crease and lofts a good length ball through the line over mid-on, the ball goes high in the air and drops inside the boundary, the outfield is slow and the ball just about reaches the boundary
driven off the front foot towards mid-off
Prior stays in his crease this time and defends towards midwicket
good length delivery on middle and leg stump, Prior moves across and closes the face to play the ball towards square leg
Bell comes forward and drives a short of a length delivery on the up through cover, there's a fielder in the deep
Prior moves on to the back foot and plays a good length ball towards third man

caught! Splendidly done by de Villiers! Kallis bowls a slower ball wide outside off stump, Bell chases it and slashes the ball in the air towards point, de Villiers times his jump to perfection and leaps high in the air to take the catch above his head with both hands
Kallis pitches on a good length outside off and angles the ball into the right-hander, Shah lets it go
Shah moves towards the line of the ball outside off stump and opens the face of the bat to play it towards third man
Prior moves deep in his crease to defend a good length ball angling into his off stump
good length ball outside off stump, defended on the front foot towards the off side
Nel angles the ball into the right-hander, Shah moves back and across and defends towards midwicket
Shah moves back and tries to nudge a short ball on the leg side but mis-hits it
Nel hits a tight line around off stump, Shah defends on the front foot towards the bowler
Nel delivers a slower short ball and Shah completes the pull before the ball reaches him, he gets hit on the arm and the ball goes towards third man for leg byes
fuller ball on off and middle stump, Prior pushes the ball off the front foot towards midwicket
on cue Shah throws his bat at a good length ball outside off and slashes it down to third man off the outside edge
Prior's taken him on here! He came down the pitch, moved towards leg to create room, and lofted the ball high and far over wide long on, that's the innings' first six

caught by de Villiers at point again! Prior slashed at one that was away from his body and hit the ball in the air towards de Villiers who didn't have to jump this time, that was a sitter by his lofty standards
defended on the front foot towards the leg side
Pietersen gets on top of a bouncer and pulls the ball towards deep midwicket
Shah gets behind the line and defends towards the bowler
the batsman moves across his stumps and plays the ball towards square leg
Pietersen moves across his stumps and drives through midwicket
Pietersen moves towards the off side and comfortably pushes a flat ball through square leg
defended off the back foot towards midwicket
Shah gets down on one knee and sweeps a poor ball - too much on leg stump - towards fine leg, Kallis saves the boundary with a dive
nudged off the back foot towards short third man
Pietersen jumps forward and towards the off side to flick a ball off his hips behind square, he created the angle to play the shot with his footwork
driven off the front foot towards cover, that was a fuller ball from Kallis outside off
short of a length outside off stump, Shah waits for it and dabs the ball towards third man
he tried to play that on the off but the inside edge took it towards the leg
short of a length delivery outside off stump, Shah stands tall, rolls his wrists and pulls the ball along the ground towards deep midwicket
driven off the front foot towards the off side
Shah moves deep into his crease and nudges a flat delivery from off stump through point
Pietersen moves back and across and plays the ball towards midwicket
Pietersen tries to sweep but gets hit on the pad, he had moved his front pad outside the line of off stump
Pietersen moves back and across, quite a long way, and works the ball behind square
flighted delivery, Shah stays in his crease and the ball drops nearly into his block hole, he digs it out
driven off the front foot towards long-off
good length from Kallis, cramping Shah for room, he defends towards midwicket
Shah uses the width outside off to dab the ball towards third man, the single brings up England's 100
the edge falls just short of Boucher! Pietersen tried to drive a ball on the up, it jagged back into him and took the inside edge, Boucher dived to his left but the ball fell inches short
flicked off the back foot behind square
good length outside off, left alone by the batsman
full ball on off stump, Pietersen moves across his stumps and drives the ball wide of mid-on, he was in an awkward position because of the length
tossed up on middle and leg, he moves across his stumps and pushes it wide of deep square leg, they complete the second comfortably
walks across his stumps and taps it to midwicket
gets forward and pushes it down to midwicket again
gives it more air, he shuffles and softly tucks it behind square on the on side for a single
gets forward and taps it back to the bowler
flighted on middle and off, he pushes it down the pitch
pitches it outside off and Pietersen chips it one handed down to the vacant mid-off region, strange shot
hits a good length outside off, he slices it wide of point
walks across his stumps and picks that from outside off and turns it to deep square leg
goes for an across the line heave from outside off and mistimes it, deep square runs forward and collects it
bangs it short down the leg side, he moves across his stumps for a premature slap down to fine leg but he misses
the slow bouncer again down the leg side, he moves across to pull but mistimes it, the ball rolls behind the keeper
fuller in length, he drags it down to midwicket

Philander juggles and he'll thank the heavens it actually stuck, flighted on middle and leg, he gets on his knee and gets a big top edge on the slog sweep, Philander at fine leg gets under it, tries to catch it Aussie style, the ball slips through his hands and he holds onto it when it rebounds off his chest
flighted outside off, he really waits for it on the front foot before softly nudging it down wide of short square leg
fired it quicker, he digs it out to short cover
too much flight this time, he gets forward and pushes the full toss to long-on
waits at the crease for the turn, he softly turns it back to the bowler
touch fuller, he pushes it with the turn back to the bowler
gets forward and angles it down to backward point, de Villiers slides and cuts it off
gets forward to a full delivery, he pushes it through the line to long-off
gets across his stumps early and turns it with the line to fine leg
hits a good length outside off, he walks across to cover the line before tapping it to mid-off
he fails to pick the slower delivery as he fishes outside the off stump
gets forward and pushes it firmly to Gibbs at short extra cover
steps down the track early, sees the fuller length and pushes it down to long-on
walks down the pitch again and pushes it through the line to long-on
Appeal! Walks across his stumps to sweep, exposes all three stumps and it looked like he was hit in front, the umpire Gould probably reckoned he hit it
driven to the on side for a single
gets on the backfoot and drives to the off side
flighted on middle and off, he gets on his knee and sweeps behind square
gets forward and pushes it down towards cover
pushes it firmly down the track back to the bowler, he gets a hand to it and Pietersen falls over as he drags his bat back to the crease
fullish outside off, he drives it down to the covers
makes room to slap that through the off side but he ends up mistiming it down to deep cover
bangs in the bouncer, he withdraws the stroke and ducks
gets across his stumps and taps a good length delivery down to long-on
Flintoff strides forward and closes the face of a flatter ball towards square leg

is that a run out? Was the bat in the air? Pietersen played the ball off his pads behind square and set off for the single, he turned around and sprinted back for the second, Philander threw the ball flat and hard right over the stumps, Pietersen dived full length and his bat was bouncing all over the place as Boucher broke the stumps, it was too tough to give for the third umpire
nudged off the front foot towards midwicket
bowled flat and full into the blockhole, Pietersen defends back to the bowler
Pietersen strides forward and drives the ball from outside off through wide mid-on
flighted delivery and the ball dips sharply towards middle stump, Flintoff plays it back to the bowler
driven off the front foot towards mid-on
good length delivery outside off stump, Pietersen gets on to the front foot and drives to long off
Flintoff comes down the track but Philander follows him and cramps him for room, Flintoff drives towards long-on
nudged off the back foot towards the leg side, that was the slower one
Pietersen moves across his stumps and flicks a fuller ball behind square
the slower ball goes awry, Philander slips down leg side and that's a wide, that was only 60 mph
good length just outside off stump, defended towards point off the front foot
full ball on middle stump, Pietersen pushes it towards Smith at mid-on, he is on the edge of the circle and the batsmen run a single
Flintoff tries to make room but Steyn follows him, he pushes it gently towards the off side and they run a single

Pietersen closes the face too early to a full ball and gets a leading edge back past the bowler, Flintoff sets off for the single but Pietersen sends him back, Pietersen then decides he wants the single and sets off only to scamper back in the end
Pietersen pushes the ball through the leg side for one
Flintoff backs away towards the leg side and punches the ball firmly through cover for four, that's the first boundary scored by an England batsman other than Matt Prior
Flintoff tries to steer a short of a length ball to third man but misses
Pietersen tries to drive down the ground but the good length delivery on off stump hits his outside edge and goes towards third man

massive air on that shot! Flintoff moves across his stumps and lofts Ntini with the angle over midwicket, the ball plugs in the soft outfield after pitching and doesn't even reach the boundary, that would have been four under normal circumstances
Flintoff backs away, makes room, and hits Ntini with a flat bat past mid-off for four, he's getting a move on
full ball driven towards mid on for a single
Pietersen moves across his stumps and flicks behind square
Flintoff moves forward and towards the line of the ball and drives it behind point, he's placed that to the left of the fielder on the boundary and gets two

Pietersen takes a step out of his crease and nudges the ball past the bowler, Flintoff is backing up and hurries to make his ground, once the ball passes the stumps Pietersen calls Flintoff through for the single
Flintoff flicks firmly off his pads towards deep square leg where Ntini slides and saves the boundary
Flintoff makes room and guides the ball towards third man by opening the face, he's placed it wide of the fielder and will come back for the second
Steyn slips in the slower one on off and middle stump, Flintoff backs away and adjusts his stroke, he defends towards cover
Flintoff moves forward and towards the off side, once he's in position, he swivels and pulls the short of a length delivery towards Ntini at deep backward square leg
the slower ball bowled full and straight, Pietersen comes forward and plays it very straight, too straight for he hits the stumps at the bowler's end
Flintoff backs away towards  the leg side to make room, Philander follows him with a short of a length ball and cramps the batsman, Flintoff gets beaten
the slower ball at 71 mph outside off, Flintoff drives the ball to point
tight line and length on middle stump, that was another slower ball, Flintoff defends on the leg side
Flintoff moves forward and drives a good length ball towards long-off
Philander strays down leg side, the fine leg is back on the boundary, Pietersen tries to flick but misses and gets hit on the pad, he tried to hit it too hard and was beaten by a slower one
driven on the up through cover for a single, excellent over from Philander, only two off it
Pietersen uses his feet to get to the pitch of the ball and drives towards wide long-on
Pietersen steps out of his crease and takes it on the full, he hits it to midwicket
driven towards midwicket where a fumble allows the single, that brings up the 50-run stand
full toss on middle stump, Flintoff drives and places it past cover, Kallis fields on the boundary
cut off the back foot towards point
full toss and Pietesen pulls the ball powerfully towards midwicket, he's hit it far enough to the left of the fielder at deep midwicket to reach the boundary
driven powerfully off the front foot towards Gibbs at cover, he dives to his right and fields
backs away and plays the ball towards midwicket
Pietersen charges down the track and dispatches a length delivery with a powerful swing of the bat, that was the slower ball but Pietersen waited and hit it very straight
short ball and Pietersen pulls off the back foot towards deep micwicket
another slower ball and Flintoff picked it, he made room, waited for it, got to the pitch of the ball and smashed it over the bowler's head for a one-bounce four
played from the crease towards point
better length on off stump, Flintoff defends towards the bowler off the front foot
short, wide and smashed! That's too much width from Nel and Pietersen drills the cover drive powerfully to beat Duminy on the boudnary, that shot brings up his fifty too, well played KP
amazing improvisation! Pietersen gets out of his crease, outside the line of off stump, and sweeps Nel past short fine leg for four more
full ball on off stump, Pietersen moves back and across and plays the ball through midwicket
full ball on off stump, driven off the front foot towards Kallis at long off, they run hard for the second
short of a length outside off stump, Pietersen gets on to the front foot and pulls towards Ntini at deep midwicket
Flintoff comes down the track and drives a length ball through extra cover, Kallis runs to his left from long-off and cuts off the boundary
Pietersen moves towards the off side and tries to slog towards the leg side, Philander sees him and bowls it wider outside off stump, Pietersen misses, riveting stuff
the low full toss on off and middle, Pietersen plays the ball through midwicket for a single
Flintoff waits on the back foot and cuts the ball late past the fielder at point, third man has to run to his right to field so the batsmen complete the second
another low full toss, driven off the front foot towards long-off

loud appeal for lbw but umpire Taufel says not out, it was the slower ball from Philander and Pietersen came across his stumps to play across the line, he missed and got hit on the knee roll, that was close, the only doubt was the height
driven down the ground for a single
full ball on off stump, driven towards long-off on the front foot
Nel bowls a slow low full toss outside off stump, Pietersen stays in his crease and drives towards long off
Flintoff backs away and drives a short of a length ball on the up through cover for  a single
Nel fires the ball into the block hole, Pietersen hits it to Gibbs at midwicket and immediately sets off for the single, Gibbs doesn't throw at the keepers end because there was no one backing up
short of a length and wide outside off stump, Flintoff waits for it, gets under the ball and hits it over cover, he's found the gap and Duminy can't reach the ball in time
short of a length delivery on off, Flintoff cuts towards point
too full on off stump and Pietersen drives the ball hard towards long-off
Philander bowls a yorker on off stump which Flintoff digs out towards the bowler
length delivery outside off stump and Flintoff hits it flat and hard towards long-off
another yorker from Philander and Pietersen can only defend it towards cover
a low full toss this time and Pietersen drives towards long on
full ball on off stump, Flintoff drives towards cover
Nel also finds the block hole, Pietersen tries to hit it through midwicket but doesn't time it well

full ball in the block hole outside off stump, Pietersen stretches out and digs it out on the off side, Pietersen sets off for the single but Nel sprints to the ball, turns around, and shies at the non-striker's end, Pietersen would have been out if the ball had hit the stumps
Flintoff reaches fifty by moving across his stumps and flicking a full ball from off stump past short fine leg, that's also brought up the 100 partnership
full ball in the block hole, defended on the off side
Flintoff moves forward and across and pulls a full toss towards deep midwicket, it reaches the fielder on the bounce
Pietersen waits in his crease for another full ball and drives towards the fielder on the sweeper boundary
full ball outside off stump, Pietersen swings his bat hard and drives through cover, he didn't time it all that well
Flintoff stays in his crease and hits a length ball from off stump towards long-on
Pietersen backs away to make room and pulls the ball hard over midwicket, de villiers  tries to make the save on the boudnary but can't stop it
Pietersen gets under a length ball this time and lofts the ball powerfully over deep midwicket, no one's getting near that apart from those  in the crowd
Pietersen clears his front foot out of the way and hits another length ball towards wide long-on, he won't get four this time
a full toss and Flintoff doesn't connect with the pull, he gets hit on the thigh
clever, and brilliant! Flintoff moves outside the line of off stump, goes deep into his crease, and flicks the ball from outside off stump past the fielder at short fine leg
short of a length outside off stump, Flintoff makes room and lofts the ball over cover towards the fielder on the boundary
Flintoff once again moves outside the line of off stump and flicks a full ball towards short fine leg, this time he can't beat the fielder
Nel surprises Flintoff, who had moved towards leg, with a bouncer, Flintoff ducks under it
and again! Flintoff moves far outside off stump and flicks a full ball wide of the man at short fine leg, not much Nel can do here, Flintoff is using his feet supremely
full toss on middle stump, Flintoff backs away and hits the ball hard towards long-on
Flintoff backs away to create room but Steyn fires in the yorker, Flintoff plays it back to the bowler
too full outside off stump, Flintoff frees his arms and plays a booming cover drive, Ntini runs hard to his left and dives but can't stop it
Flintoff drives another full ball towards extra cover but Gibbs runs to his right and cuts it off in the in-field
played from the crease towards third man
such power and precision, Flintoff moves across his stumps and drives a full ball with a lot of strength, he's placed it right past the bowler and neither long on nor long off can cut it off
Flintoff moves across his stumps and tries to flick, he doesn't connect and the ball misses leg stump and beats Boucher who dives to his left
full ball on off stump, driven from the crease powerfully towards long-on
full toss outside off stump, Flintoff moves towards the off and pulls hard into the gap at deep midwicket, Botha moves to his right and cuts it off
forced off the pads towards midwicket, they run a single but had Gibbs hit at the bowler's end there would have been a run out
would you believe it, de Villiers mis-fields and concedes a boundary, Pietersen drove that hard towards wide long off and de Villiers sort of over-ran it
another boundary! Pietersen uses the long handle and drives the ball hard and straight, perfect placement
full toss but Pietersen doesn't time it well, he mis-hits it towards long-on
Pietersen backs away to make room and drills the drive towards cover where Gibbs dives to his right and cuts it off

bowled him! Flintoff moves outside off stump and tries to flick Steyn past short fine leg, he did it successfully against Nel but Steyn is significantly quicker, Flintoff misses and the ball hits middle stump
full toss and Wright hits it to midwicket for a single
excellent yorker, Pietersen can't do much but dig it out towards square leg
Wright backs away and slogs at a slower ball, he manages to make contact but doesn't time it well, he gets the single though towards the leg side
Pietersen tries to whack a length ball straight down the ground but mis-hits it towards long on, just the single to end the innings

inn2.comm: full ball outside off stump, a hint of movement away from the right-hander, Gibbs lets it go
full again and much wider outside off stump, it swings away from Gibbs as well, Prior dives to his right but can't collect cleanly, South Africa are away
good length delivery pitches around off stump and slants across Smith who defends inside the line and gets beaten
full length on off stump, Smith pushes forward at it and gets a thick outside edge that runs behind point for  a single
full ball on off stump, Gibbs tries to drive straight but gets an inside edge that goes between midwicket and mid-on
good length delivery on off stump, Gibbs gets behind the line and defends on the off side on the back foot
a bit too straight this time and Gibbs leans across his stumps and flicks, he can't get the ball past the fielder at midwicket
good length on off stump, Smith strides forward and defends towards point
Smith moves forward and outside the line of off stump, Anderson slants a good length ball across him and he lets it go
the line is too straight and Smith's strong off his pads, he flicks towards deep backward square
good length delivery outside off stump, Gibbs waits on the back foot and lets the ball pass
poor line, on leg stump, Gibbs hops across and nudges the ball off his pads towards fine leg, Broad is rather square and won't reach it in time
Gibbs stays in his crease and pushes at a good length ball, he plays it towards point
Broad pitches on leg and angles it into Smith's hips, Smith moves across his stumps and plays the ball towards deep backward square
fuller ball outside off stump, Smith strides forward and defends towards cover
full ball on off stump, Smith drives firmly towards wide mid-off where Pietersen moves quickly to his right and fields, he throws at the keeper's end and concedes an overthrow
width offered outside off stump and Smith stays on the back foot to cut towards Harmison at third man
Broad cramps Gibbs for room with a good length delivery that angles into the right-hander, Gibbs moves back to work the ball on the leg side but gets hit on the thigh
Gibbs stays in his crease and defends a good length ball towards cover
too full outside off stump, Smith reaches out for it and drives the ball firmly through the gap  cover point
that's not that wide outside off stump but it has been called, bit harsh that
closer to off stump this time, driven off the front foot towards mid-off
short of a length outside off stump, Smith cuts hard off the back foot but Bopara leaps to his right at backward point and cuts it off
Sanderson fires one into the block hole, Gibbs just about manages to get an inside edge on to it before it hits his pad
excellent ball, Anderson pitches on a good length and seams the ball a fraction away from the right-hander, the movement was just enough to beat Gibbs as he drove on the up
Gibbs flicks a good length ball off his pads and it falls just short of the man stationed at short midwicket
too straight once again and Smith flicks the ball off his pads towards square leg
good length from Broad just outside off stump, Gibbs stays on the back foot and defends towards the off side
Broad angles the ball into middle stump, Gibbs moves back and closes the face to play the ball towards Shah at midwicket
Gibbs pushes the ball towards mid on and calls for a risky single, Wright fails to pick up or else it could have been close
that's too full on middle and leg, Smith flicks the ball through the gap between midwicket and mid-on, Wright races after it and slides to save two runs
Smith strides forward and defends towards point
Anderson strays down leg side, Gibbs misses the flick and it's called wide
Anderson angles the ball into the right-hander and hits Gibbs on the pad as he tries to flick, the impact was on leg stump and it would have missed leg
Gibbs steps out of his crease and makes room to drive the ball inside out through cover for four, well timed
poor line, down leg side, Gibbs misses the flick but the ball brushes his pad and beats Prior who dives to his left
the line is on leg stump once again, Gibbs leans across and flicks through square leg
Anderson bowls a short ball which also goes down leg side, that's another wide
Anderson is struggling here, he's bowled another one down leg side
good length delivery on off and middle, Gibbs gets behind the line and defends towards the bowler
better line an length on off and middle, Gibbs defends on the front foot
Smith stays in his crease and pushes towards point
good length from Broad outside off stump, Gibbs moves forward and pushes the ball towards point
defended on the leg side
Gibbs charges down the pitch, gets under a length delivery and lofts it inside out over extra cover for six! He stayed on the leg side to make room and freed his arms
Gibbs waits in his crease and opens the face to play the ball towards third man
short of a length delivery angling across the left-hander, Smith uses the width to guide the ball to third man
starts off with a good length ball on off stump, smith defends on the front foot, the crowd gives Harmison a loud cheer
short of a length outside off stump, Smith sees the width and goes after it, he gets a thick edge that flies over the slips for four
pushed off the front foot towards cover
not that wide outside off stump this time but it's been called

caught! Harmison strikes in his first over in his comeback match. Harmison pitches the ball on a good length in line with the stumps and seams it across the left-hander, Smith fends at it and gets an edge through to Prior who takes a simple catch
full delivery angling into off stump, Kallis strides out and pushes the ball towards point
short of a length delivery pushes Kallis on to the back foot, he defends on the leg side
poor line, on leg stump, Gibbs moves across and flicks past fine leg who is in the circle
the line is on leg stump again and Gibbs nudges it off his hips towards backward square leg
good length outside off stump, pushed off the back foot towards the off side
pace from Broad, he goes wide of the crease and delivers at 91 mph, the ball pitches on a good length and lifts on Gibbs who tries to defend but gets beaten
shot! Gibbs rocks on to the back foot and uses the width outside off stump to drive the ball fiercely through cover for four
Broad ends the over with a slower ball which Gibbs defends on the back foot
Harmison hits a good length just outside off stump, Kallis lets it go through to Prior
89 mph but the line is too wide outside off and the length is a bit full, Kallis strides forward and drives on the up through cover point for four
Kallis moves back and drives off the back foot towards cover
Harmison is getting close to 90 mph, Kallis moves back in his crease and defends towards the off side
short ball, Kallis swivels and plays a pull shot along the ground behind square
Harmison cuts the ball into the right-hander, Gibbs moves back and plays the ball towards midwicket
good length delivery to begin with on off stump, pushed off the front foot towards cover
Flintoff gets a bit too straight and Kallis works the ball off his pads behind square
Flintoff tucks Gibbs up with a good length ball which angles into the right-hander, that was 91 mph, Gibbs defends on the leg side
my my my! Gibbs charges down to a delivery at 89 mph and hits a length ball through the line over mid-off, he's hit that wonderfully after making room to hit by moving towards leg
Gibbs plays the ball back at the bowler, it gets past Flintoff and they run a  single
Kallis strides forward and defends a good length ball towards cover
Gibbs stays in his crease and drives a good length delivery towards mid-off
Harmison hits a good length and angles the ball into the right-hander, Gibbs pushes at it and gets a thick inside edge towards square leg
worked off the pads down to fine leg
Gibbs moves back in his crease and plays a good length ball towards cover
Harmison gets the ball to lift off a good length just outside off stump, Gibbs strides forward and lets it go
a fuller ball on middle stump, Gibbs forces it out towards mid-on
short of a length outside off stump, Kallis attempts to cut off the back foot but tries to hit it a bit too hard and gets a bottom edge into the ground
defended off the front foot towards cover
Kallis was looking to drive that a lot straighter than midwicket, the angle into the right-hander forced the mis-hit
nimble footwork, Kallis moves across his stumps and flicks a 91 mph delivery from outside off through square leg for four
poor ball, a full toss on leg stump, Kallis helps himself to another boundary by clipping the ball off his pads towards deep backward square leg

width offered outside off stump and Kallis throws his bat out and steers the ball through the vacant slip cordon for the third four in a row, Pietersen had just taken out the fielder at slip and put him at midwicket
Gibbs steps out of his crease and plays a short of a length delivery towards mid-off
defended off the back foot towards the off side
short of a length just outside off stump, Gibbs moves on to the back foot and plays the ball towards point
terrific shot! Harmison tests Kallis with a short ball and Kallis is up for it, he swivels and pulls the ball down to deep backward square leg for a one-bounce four
the good length delivery skids into Kallis who defends hurriedly from his crease
Harmison goes wide of the crease and delivers a full ball towards off stump, Kallis comes forward and drives towards point
Gibbs leans forward and drives a full length ball towards wide mid-on
Flintoff keeps it on a good length around off stump, Kallis strides forward and defends towards cover
Kallis moves forward and across to create and angle to flick the ball from off stump towards midwicket, he doesn't beat the fielder though
pushed off the front foot towards mid-on
Flintoff fires the yorker in on middle stump, remember the working over he gave Kallis in the Tests? This time Kallis digs it out
Kallis strides forward and drives a full ball back at the bowler, Fintoff bends down low in his follow through and fields
bowled flat through the air on off stump, pushed off the front foot through cover
Kallis gets on to the front foot and plays the ball through cover point
driven off the back foot towards the fielder on the cover boundary

England celebrate as Gibbs is bowled! He moved back to cut one that went straight through from Patel, there was no room and the ball was quick, Gibbs missed and Patel hit off stump, the bowling change pays immediate dividends
defended on the front foot towards the off side
de Villiers gets on to the front foot and blocks
Flintoff bowls on a good length just outside off stump, Kallis tries to drive on the up but misses
Flintoff doesn't quite find the block hole and Kallis drives the ball past the bowler and sets off for a single
90.5 mph, Flintoff cramps de Villiers for room with one that angles into the right-hander, de Villiers stays in his crease and defends on the leg side
de Villiers gets off the mark by jumping on to the back foot and nudging a short of a length delivery behind square
fantastic ball, Flintoff pitches the ball short of a length and seams the ball away from the right-hander, Kallis gets squared up and beaten
pushed towards Broad who is standing deep at mid-on, the batsmen run the single
too short and wide outside off stump, Kallis has enough room to cut hard past point for four
full ball outside off stump, Kallis drives off the front foot, he hit that firmly but straight to cover point
he's hammered that, he drove that with tremendous power but hit it to Anderson at cover point, the length is a bit too full from Harmison
short of a length outside off stump, Kallis stands tall and tries to cut it over point, he is beaten by the extra bounce
after hitting several out of the middle in this over Kallis finally mis-times the drive towards cover
good length on off stump, Kallis tries to drive but once again mis-times it towards Harmison
good length delivery just outside off stump, de Villiers strides forward and lets it go through to Prior
de Villiers tries to cut the ball through point but gets beaten, the ball passed under his bat
Flintoff pitches the ball outside off and angles it towards the right-hander, de Villiers moves forward and lets it go
short of a length from Flintoff outside off stump, de Villiers jumps on to the back foot and plays the ball with an open face towards point
full ball on off and middle, de Villiers leans forward and drives towards mid-on who is close enough to save the single
Flintoff hits the block hole outside off stump to complete a maiden over, de Villiers plays the ball towards cover
Kallis moves across his crease and plays the ball with soft hands on the pitch, de Villiers sets off and Kallis responds quickly
too full outside off stump and de Villiers plays a delightful square drive and places the ball behind point for four
short of a length outside off, de Villiers moves back in his crease and shoulders arms
good length from Harmison angling into the right-hander, de Villiers moves back and across and pushes the ball towards the leg side
Kallis moves back in his crease and pushes a good length ball which angles into middle and leg through midwicket
Harmison ends the over with a slower ball on middle stump, that was measured at 75 mph, Kallis plays it past the bowler with a straight bat
short of a length outside off stump, de Villiers plays the ball with soft hands towards cover point and sprints the single
terrific shot, Kallis strides out to meet a full ball and drives through cover, excellent timing but Kallis looks like he is in some discomfort
Kallis gets on to the back foot and drives the ball past point, Kallis wanted two, de Villiers settled at one
good length delivery outside off stump, de Villiers lets it go
de Villiers moves back and across to defend but gets an outside edge to a good length delivery, the ball runs down towards the third-man boudnary
too full on the pads, de Villiers leans across and glances the ball fine of the fielder at short fine leg
bowled flat through the air on off stump, defended on the front foot
driven off the front foot towards Bell at cover
Kallis moves back in his crease and steers the ball past short third man by opening the face of the bat
Kallis leans forward and pushes the ball towards long on for a single
bowled flat and straight, defended back to the bowler
driven down the ground towards long on
good length on off and middle, played off the pads behind square
de Villiers moves back and pushes the ball towards the bowler
a bit too straight and de Villiers skips on to the back foot and whips the ball hard off his pads towards deep midwicket
better length and line around off stump, de Villiers defends on the front foot
de Villiers moves back and across again to whip the ball firmly through midwicket
fuller delivery and Kallis drives off the front foot towards long off
fuller ball, driven off the front foot towards long on
Kallis moves forward and plays the ball towards Patel
worked off the pads through midwicket for a single
de Villiers gets on to the from foot and drives towards long off
flicked wristily through midwicket for a single
Kallis stays in his crease and works a ball from his pads towards short fine leg
short ball and Kallis pulls the ball hard into the gap at deep midwicket, Anderson slides on the boundary but the ball skids past him
defended on the front foot
driven off the front foot towards long on
de Villiers gets a single by driving off the front foot to long on
bowled flat through the air on off stump, de Villiers comes forward an defends towards the bowler
de Villiers strides forward and drives the ball past midwicket towards long on
Kallis gets on to the front foot and pushes towards mid-off
full ball on middle and leg, Kallis drives towards long on and collects a single
bowled flat through the air, de Villiers leans forward and drives towards the bowler
defended on the front foot once again
defended on the front foot
worked off the pads behind square
Kallis strides forward and drives the ball behind point
de Villiers steps out of his crease and pushes the ball towards midwicket

would you believe it, Pietersen's struck!! He can do little wrong at the moment, de Villiers leans forward and across and flicks a flat delivery in the air towards midwicket where Bell takes a simple catch
Kallis strides forward and drives a full ball towards deep cover to bring up his fifty
defended on the front foot towards cover
bowled full outside off stump, Kallis moves forward and drives through cover once again
Duminy leans across towards the off side, gets down on one knee and attempts to sweep, he doesn't make proper contact
defended back to the bowler
Duminy gets down on one knee once again and plays the paddle sweep, Patel is bowling over the wicket to the left-hander
Duminy moves forward and drives a full ball through cover
Kallis gets outside the line of off stump and defends on the leg side
Kallis moves across and works the ball off his pads through square leg
Duminy moves his front pad outside the line of off stump and nudges the ball into the gap at midwicket
Kallis flicks the ball towards short fine leg, the asking-rate has touched six for the first time in the innings

Kallis is run out!! He pushed the ball towards midwicket and was slow in setting off for the single, Bell swooped down on the ball, picked up and turned around to throw at Kallis' end for Duminy was quick, the throw came to Pietersen who collected in front of the stumps but managed to break the stumps with Kallis well short
defended on the front foot
driven off the front foot towards cover
bowled flat through the air on off and middle, defended on the back foot
played off the pads behind square, they want the second and manage to complete it even though the throw is good to Prior
Boucher strides forward and drives the ball towards long off for a single
Duminy leans forward and plays the ball with the angle into him towards midwicket
Pietersen bowls a full toss and Boucher drives the ball off the front foot towards long-on
full and wide outside off, Duminy reaches out and drives the ball through cover
Boucher moves his front pad outside off stump and defends
Boucher tries to play the ball behind square on the off side but gets beaten
that's a high full toss and Boucher swats the ball powerfully to the deep square leg boundary
driven off the front foot towards long off
that's too short outside off, Boucher reaches out for it and cuts it late towards the third man boundary, the fielder at short fine leg had no chance of chasing that down
driven off the front foot towards long off for one
Duminy leans forward and pushes the ball towards midwicket
Duminy waits in his crease and dabs the ball late towards short third man, Broad does the fielding
punched off the back foot towards long on for a single
Duminy comes on to the front foot and clips the ball towards midwicket
Boucher works the ball off his pads through midwicket
flighted delivery from Pietersen, Duminy nudges it into the vacant region at midwicket for a single

loud appeal for a stumping! Has Pietersen got another one? Boucher tried to sweep from outside off stump and was beaten, he dragged his back foot outside the crease and took an age to get it back, Prior collected and whipped off the bails, replays showed Boucher's foot to be just on the line, close call but the third umpire's given it out, it didn't look like there was anything grounded behind the line
tossed up outside off stump, Botha defends on the front foot
Botha strides out and defends
Botha moves back and works the ball off his pads through square leg
Patel fires it in quick outside the off stump, Botha tries to cut but gets beaten
defended off the back foot to cover
flat ball and it skids on to Botha who moves back and defends to the bowler
drifts on to leg stump and Botha leans across to sweep towards Broad at deep backward square leg
bowled fast, flat, and straight, Duminy defends back towards the bowler
Duminy leans forward and uses the angle into him to nudge the ball towards fine leg, Luke Wright runs after it
another high full toss from Pietersen and Botha pulls it into the vacant space at deep square leg for four
Botha leans across and works the ball off his pads towards square leg
tossed up outside off stump, Botha strides forward and drives firmly towards cover
Botha leans forward and drives the ball towards long-on
Duminy tries to sweep from outside off stump but gets beaten by Pietersen who is bowling from roudn the wicket for the left-hander
shouts of "caaaatch it!!" but Duminy's mis-hit falls well short of long-on
played off the pads towards square leg, Anderson runs in from the boudnary and throws the ball to Prior
Botha closes the face too early and gets a leading edge that goes in the air but falls safely on the off side
Duminy works the ball fine past the fielder in the circle and they run swiftly to complete three
Botha pushes the ball off the front foot on the off side
Duminy tries to sweep but misses and gets hit on the pad outside the line of off stump
Duminy moves forward and stabs at the ball to push it towards point
good length delivery angling across the left-hander from over the wicket, Duminy defends on the front foot

Duminy tries to work the ball off his hips but misses, the ball hits the bat and then the thigh and falls towards the leg side, Botha sprints through for the single but Flintoff swoops down on the ball and under-arms the throw at the batsman's stumps, he hits but Botha is safe
short of a length ball angling into the right-hander, Botha works the ball off his body behind square
defended on the front foot on the off side
Flintoff pitches outside leg stump, Duminy tries to work the ball off his pads but misses
tight lien and length just outside off stump, Duminy drives past the bowler for a single
defended on the front foot towards the leg side
swept from outside off stump towards deep backward square, he hit that hard
well well, Botha gets into position early and plays the reverse sweep past the fielder at short third man for four, excellent execution
pushed off the front foot on the leg side
he's played the reverse sweep once again but this time the placement is squarer towards point
a full ball plays towards midwicket
full ball angling into leg stump, Botha tries to flick but misses and gets hit on the pad
short of a length delivery banged into Duminy's body from over the wicket, he tries to work it behind square but gets hit on the thigh
too straight from Flintoff and Botha flicks the ball firmly off his pads towards deep square leg where Anderson dives to his right and cuts off the boundary
Botha moves back and works the ball off his hips through square leg
Duminy uses the angle across him from over the wicket to steer the ball towards third man
full ball angling into off stump, Botha moves forward and drives the ball back at Flintoff who picks it up with one hand
Duminy leans forward to drive but mis-times it to cover
Duminy moves across his stumps and tries to flick but misses and gets hit high on the pad, that ball pitched outside leg stump
Duminy stays on the back foot and tries to guide one to third man but gets beaten by pace and bounce

caught! Harmison pitches short of a length and slants the ball across Duminy who stays rooted to his crease and reaches out for it, he's looking to run it down to third man but feathers a nick through to Prior who takes a sharp low catch, Harmison delivers in the first over of a spell once again
that's far too wide down leg side, Gould calls it wide
Harmison must still be bowling to the left-hander for that's down leg side once again
Harmison fires the ball into the block hole and Philander just about manages to get an inside edge on to the pad
short of a length outside off stump, Botha stays on the back foot and lets it go
he swings a full ball into the right-hander, Philander gets an inside edge on to his pad
too full this time and Philander moves forward to drive the ball past the bowler
short of a length delivery keeps Botha in his crease, he defends on the back foot and the ball bounces extremely close to the stumps
Broad strays down leg side this time, that's another wide
fuller length angling into off and middle, Botha plays the ball towards midwicket off the front foot
Philander uses the angle Broad is bowling into the right-hander to work the ball through square leg
Broad moves forward and across and nudges the ball gently off his pads towards deep square leg
full delivery angling into off stump, punched off the front foot towards the fielder in the circle at mid-off
Philander closes the face of the bat to push a good length ball towards midwicket
short of a length outside off stump, Philander swishes and misses, three dots in a low, the pressure is growing on Philander
Philander can't score yet again, he pushes a good length ball towards mid-off, Harmison's line and length has been tight around off stump
the fifth dot in a row, Philander comes forward and defends the ball towards the bowler
no he can't! Terrific over from Harmison, he finishes it with a slower ball which Philander dabs towards the leg side, Harmison sprints across the stop the single
Botha moves across his stumps to sweep past short fine leg but doesn't make proper contact
short of a length outside off stump, Botha moves back and plays the ball towards third man with an open face
Philander can't find the gaps, he pushes a good length ball towards cover, he's played seven dots in a row
short and wide outside off stump, loose ball, Philander reaches out and cuts it towards the fielder on the point boundary
cut hard off the back foot by Botha towards point where Bopara dives to his left and saves runs
short of a length outside off, Philander cuts off the front foot in front of Bopara at point
Philander is struggling, he pushes another good length ball tamely towards mid-off
Philander played a desperate pull and mis-hit it in the air towards mid-on, the ball fell safely and Philander had to dive full length at the non-striker's end to make his ground
Botha comes forward and flicks the ball towards midwicket
Harmison shortens his length and Botha swivels to pull the ball towards deep square leg, he didn't time that either
full and straight from Harmison, Philander drives past the bowler for the single
Botha tries to flick the ball off his pads but doesn't make proper contact, the gap between runs and balls has widened

caught! Something had to give! Botha moved forward and across and swung a length ball towards deep square leg, he didn't get enough on it to clear the boundary and Tim Bresnan, the substitute fielder, ran in to take a well-judged catch
Broad bowls a short ball which beats Philander for pace, he tried to play that on the leg side and was in all sorts of trouble
good length delivery angling into the right-hander, driven off the front foot towards mid-off
defended towards the off side
full ball on off and middle stump, Nel tries to give it a mighty whack but mis-times it towards the bowler
full toss on middle stump, pushed off the front foot toward the off side
Nel backs away towards leg to make room, or to get out of the line of the ball, and pushes towards point
the slower ball bowler full on off stump, Philander drives towards mid-off
Nel makes room and heaves, trying to hit down the ground, he gets an edge behind square on the leg side
short of a length and Philander makes good contact, he moves forward and swats the ball towards deep square leg boundary
slower ball and Philander plays down the ground for  a single
full delivery angling into middle stump, Nel backs away and plays the ball to point
bowled short and wide outside off stump, that was too high as well
driven off the back foot towards mid-off for a single
short of a length and Philander tries to launch it into orbit over the leg side, he swings hard and gets a top edge which flies down to third man
the slower ball outside off stump, Philander attempts to cut but gets beaten by the change of pace
short of a length outside off stump, Philander swings hard and connects but can't beat the fielder at cover
Nel bottom-edges the ball into the ground towards short third man, he was trying to cut
he's clobbered that and nearly broken Broad's shin in the process, it was a length ball and Philander cleared his front foot out of the way and drove the ball hard and straight past the bowler
Flintoff sends down a yorker which homes in on Nel's boot, Nel gets out of the way in the nick of time
this one is not quite in the block hole and Nel hits it down the ground
a low full toss and Philander flicks it off his pads towards deep square leg
Nel backs away to a full ball and mis-hits it back towards the bowler
Flintoff follows Nel as he moves towards leg with a low full toss, Nel swings but misses
another low full toss and Nel can only squeeze it towards point
width offered outside off stump and Nel hits it into the cover region for a single
Philander reaches out for a good length ball outside off and plays it towards third man

Philander's run out! Nel tried to pull the ball from outside off and inside edged it on to his leg, the ball fell on the pitch and after some hesitation the batsmen decided to go for the single, Broad ran to the ball and hit the stumps at the batsman's end with an under-arm throw, Philander was just short
Steyn backs away and swings a length delivery through midwicket
Broad goes wide of the crease and bowls a length ball angling into the batsman, Nel makes room and swings hard, he connects with the bottom of the bat and the ball falls between mid-on and long-on
Steyn hits a low full toss down the ground for a single
and he's got it! Fintoff fired in the yorker, Nel went across his stumps looking to chip the ball to fine leg, Flintoff was too fast and the ball crashed into the base of middle stump
low full toss outside off stump, Ntini drives the ball through point towards wide third man where Wright dives to save the boundary
Flintoff bowls an outstanding yorker which beats Ntini and beats Prior as well, the ball races for four byes
that's the end of that! Flintoff detonates leg stump from the ground with another pinpoint yorker, he flexes his muscles in celebration, England have won the first ODI by 20 runs
